com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps

Class UiSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.UiSettings

  • public final class UiSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Settings for the user interface of a MapboxMap. To obtain this interface, call getUiSettings().

    • Method Detail

      • setCompassEnabled

        public void setCompassEnabled(boolean compassEnabled)

        Enables or disables the compass. The compass is an icon on the map that indicates the direction of north on the map. When a user clicks the compass, the camera orients itself to its default orientation and fades away shortly after. If disabled, the compass will never be displayed.

        By default, the compass is enabled.
        Parameters:
        compassEnabled - True to enable the compass; false to disable the compass.

      • isCompassEnabled

        public boolean isCompassEnabled()
        Returns whether the compass is enabled.
        Returns:
        True if the compass is enabled; false if the compass is disabled.

      • setCompassGravity

        @UiThread
public void setCompassGravity(int gravity)

        Sets the gravity of the compass view. Use this to change the corner of the map view that the compass is displayed in.

        By default, the compass is in the top right corner.
        Parameters:
        gravity - Android SDK Gravity.

      • setCompassFadeFacingNorth

        public void setCompassFadeFacingNorth(boolean compassFadeFacingNorth)
        Enables or disables fading of the compass when facing north.

        By default this feature is enabled

        Parameters:
        compassFadeFacingNorth - True to enable the fading animation; false to disable it

      • setCompassImage

        public void setCompassImage(@NonNull
                            android.graphics.drawable.Drawable compass)
        Specifies the CompassView image.

        By default this value is R.drawable.mapbox_compass_icon.

        Parameters:
        compass - the drawable to show as image compass

      • isCompassFadeWhenFacingNorth

        public boolean isCompassFadeWhenFacingNorth()
        Returns whether the compass performs a fading animation out when facing north.
        Returns:
        True if the compass will fade, false if it remains visible

      • getCompassGravity

        public int getCompassGravity()
        Returns the gravity value of the CompassView
        Returns:
        The gravity

      • setCompassMargins

        @UiThread
public void setCompassMargins(@Px
                                        int left,
                                        @Px
                                        int top,
                                        @Px
                                        int right,
                                        @Px
                                        int bottom)
        Sets the margins of the compass view in pixels. Use this to change the distance of the compass from the map view edge.
        Parameters:
        left - The left margin in pixels.
        top - The top margin in pixels.
        right - The right margin in pixels.
        bottom - The bottom margin in pixels.

      • setRotateGesturesEnabled

        public void setRotateGesturesEnabled(boolean rotateGesturesEnabled)

        Changes whether the user may rotate the map.

        This setting controls only user interactions with the map. If you set the value to false, you may still change the map location programmatically.

        The default value is true.
        Parameters:
        rotateGesturesEnabled - If true, rotating is enabled.

      • isRotateGesturesEnabled

        public boolean isRotateGesturesEnabled()
        Returns whether the user may rotate the map.
        Returns:
        If true, rotating is enabled.

      • setTiltGesturesEnabled

        public void setTiltGesturesEnabled(boolean tiltGesturesEnabled)

        Changes whether the user may tilt the map.

        This setting controls only user interactions with the map. If you set the value to false, you may still change the map location programmatically.

        The default value is true.
        Parameters:
        tiltGesturesEnabled - If true, tilting is enabled.

      • isTiltGesturesEnabled

        public boolean isTiltGesturesEnabled()
        Returns whether the user may tilt the map.
        Returns:
        If true, tilting is enabled.

      • setZoomGesturesEnabled

        public void setZoomGesturesEnabled(boolean zoomGesturesEnabled)

        Changes whether the user may zoom the map.

        This setting controls only user interactions with the map. If you set the value to false, you may still change the map location programmatically.

        The default value is true.
        Parameters:
        zoomGesturesEnabled - If true, zooming is enabled.

      • isZoomGesturesEnabled

        public void setDoubleTapGesturesEnabled(boolean doubleTapGesturesEnabled)

        This setting controls only user interactions with the map. If you set the value to false, you may still change the map location programmatically.

        The default value is true.
        Parameters:
        doubleTapGesturesEnabled - If true, zooming with a double tap is enabled.

      • isQuickZoomGesturesEnabled

        public boolean isQuickZoomGesturesEnabled()
        Returns whether the user may zoom the map by tapping twice, holding and moving the pointer up and down.
        Returns:
        If true, zooming by tapping twice and holding is enabled.

      • setQuickZoomGesturesEnabled

        public void setQuickZoomGesturesEnabled(boolean quickZoomGesturesEnabled)
        Changes whether the user may zoom the map by tapping twice, holding and moving the pointer up and down.

        This setting controls only user interactions with the map. If you set the value to false, you may still change the map location programmatically.

        The default value is true.
        Parameters:
        quickZoomGesturesEnabled - If true, zooming by tapping twice and holding is enabled.

      • getZoomRate

        Returns:
        The zoom rate.

      • setZoomRate

        public void setZoomRate(float zoomRate)
        Sets zoom gesture rate, including pinch to zoom and quick scale.

        Default value is 1.0f.

        Parameters:
        zoomRate - The zoom rate.

      • isDeselectMarkersOnTap

        public boolean isDeselectMarkersOnTap()
        Gets whether the markers are automatically deselected (and therefore, their infowindows closed) when a map tap is detected.
        Returns:
        If true, markers are deselected on a map tap.

      • setScrollGesturesEnabled

        public void setScrollGesturesEnabled(boolean scrollGesturesEnabled)

        Changes whether the user may scroll around the map.

        This setting controls only user interactions with the map. If you set the value to false, you may still change the map location programmatically.

        The default value is true.
        Parameters:
        scrollGesturesEnabled - If true, scrolling is enabled.

      • isScrollGesturesEnabled

        public boolean isScrollGesturesEnabled()
        Returns whether the user may scroll around the map.

        If true, scrolling is enabled.

        The default value is true.

      • isScaleVelocityAnimationEnabled

        public boolean isScaleVelocityAnimationEnabled()
        Returns whether scale velocity animation should execute after users finishes a gesture.
        Returns:
        If true, scale velocity animation is enabled.

      • setScaleVelocityAnimationEnabled

        public void setScaleVelocityAnimationEnabled(boolean scaleVelocityAnimationEnabled)
        Set whether scale velocity animation should execute after users finishes a gesture. True by default.
        Parameters:
        scaleVelocityAnimationEnabled - If true, scale velocity animation will be enabled.

      • isRotateVelocityAnimationEnabled

        public boolean isRotateVelocityAnimationEnabled()
        Returns whether rotate velocity animation should execute after users finishes a gesture.
        Returns:
        If true, rotate velocity animation is enabled.

      • setRotateVelocityAnimationEnabled

        public void setRotateVelocityAnimationEnabled(boolean rotateVelocityAnimationEnabled)
        Set whether rotate velocity animation should execute after users finishes a gesture. True by default.
        Parameters:
        rotateVelocityAnimationEnabled - If true, rotate velocity animation will be enabled.

      • isFlingVelocityAnimationEnabled

        public boolean isFlingVelocityAnimationEnabled()
        Returns whether fling velocity animation should execute after users finishes a gesture.
        Returns:
        If true, fling velocity animation is enabled.

      • setFlingVelocityAnimationEnabled

        public void setFlingVelocityAnimationEnabled(boolean flingVelocityAnimationEnabled)
        Set whether fling velocity animation should execute after users finishes a gesture. True by default.
        Parameters:
        flingVelocityAnimationEnabled - If true, fling velocity animation will be enabled.

      • setAllVelocityAnimationsEnabled

        public void setAllVelocityAnimationsEnabled(boolean allVelocityAnimationsEnabled)
        Set whether all velocity animations should execute after users finishes a gesture.
        Parameters:
        allVelocityAnimationsEnabled - If true, all velocity animations will be enabled.

      • isIncreaseRotateThresholdWhenScaling

        @Deprecated
public boolean isIncreaseRotateThresholdWhenScaling()
        Deprecated. unused, see isDisableRotateWhenScaling() instead
        Returns whether rotation threshold should be increase whenever scale is detected.
        Returns:
        If true, rotation threshold will be increased.

      • setIncreaseRotateThresholdWhenScaling

        @Deprecated
public void setIncreaseRotateThresholdWhenScaling(boolean increaseRotateThresholdWhenScaling)
        Deprecated. unused, see setDisableRotateWhenScaling(boolean) instead
        Set whether rotation threshold should be increase whenever scale is detected.
        Parameters:
        increaseRotateThresholdWhenScaling - If true, rotation threshold will be increased.

      • isDisableRotateWhenScaling

        public boolean isDisableRotateWhenScaling()
        Returns whether rotation gesture detector is disabled when scale is detected first.
        Returns:
        If true, rotation gesture detector will be disabled when scale is detected first.

      • setDisableRotateWhenScaling

        public void setDisableRotateWhenScaling(boolean disableRotateWhenScaling)
        Set whether rotation gesture detector should be disabled when scale is detected first.
        Parameters:
        disableRotateWhenScaling - If true, rotation gesture detector will be disabled when scale is detected first.

      • isIncreaseScaleThresholdWhenRotating

        public boolean isIncreaseScaleThresholdWhenRotating()
        Returns whether scale threshold should be increase whenever rotation is detected.
        Returns:
        If true, scale threshold will be increased.

      • setIncreaseScaleThresholdWhenRotating

        public void setIncreaseScaleThresholdWhenRotating(boolean increaseScaleThresholdWhenRotating)
        set whether scale threshold should be increase whenever rotation is detected.
        Parameters:
        increaseScaleThresholdWhenRotating - If true, scale threshold will be increased.

      • setAllGesturesEnabled

        public void setAllGesturesEnabled(boolean enabled)

        Sets the preference for whether all gestures should be enabled or disabled.

        This setting controls only user interactions with the map. If you set the value to false, you may still change the map location programmatically.

        The default value is true.
        Parameters:
        enabled - If true, all gestures are available; otherwise, all gestures are disabled.
        See Also:
        ), setScrollGesturesEnabled(boolean), setRotateGesturesEnabled(boolean), setTiltGesturesEnabled(boolean), setDoubleTapGesturesEnabled(boolean), setQuickZoomGesturesEnabled(boolean)

      • areAllGesturesEnabled

        public boolean areAllGesturesEnabled()

        Retrieves the current status of whether all gestures are enabled.

        Returns:
        If true, all gestures are enabled.

                          android.graphics.PointF focalPoint)

        Parameters:
        focalPoint - the focal point to be used.
